div.h2: Welcome to Plainedge Public School District

p.span: The mission of the Plainedge School District is to inspire in each student a passion for learning, living and contributing to our global society. As such, the Board of Education is dedicated to educating students to develop desired moral, ethical, and cultural values, to stimulate and expand a continual learning process and to cultivate an understanding and appreciation of the rights and responsibilities of American citizens, which will enable them to function effectively as independent individuals in a democratic society.
